column4: is there someone here to help me configuring my wifi card with ubuntu ?
because, i'm really fed up with that...lol
which wifi card do u have?
one sec
what laptop do u have?
can u do a lspci -v and paste the output in the pastebin ?
this is an inbuilt card,right?
are you still here ?
you've no idea ?
sorry, was away
can u post that link again?
i dint recieve anything
http://ndiswrapper.sourceforge.net/mediawiki/index.php/List#I take a look at 2200BG
I thought that ndiswrapper wasn't necessary with Ubuntu ?
yours is a different version, isn't it?
try lsmod | grep ipw
wireless cards act crazy sometimes
it seems that the modules are loaded
okay, so all u are not able to do is go online?
can u do a ping and do a 'dmesg', just check if u get packet reject or something similiar?
so u even acquire an ip address via dhcp?
no problems with the driver if u are able to acquire an ip address though dhcp, afaik
what happened?
not good, try using the ndiswrapper driver and see if that works
